title: Thousands March in Hong Kong in Defiance of Anti-Mask Ban
text:
Thousands of anti-government protesters returned to Hong Kong’s streets on Sunday, October 6, in defiance of an emergency law banning activists from wearing masks.

Sunday’s rally marked the third consecutive day of protests over the mask ban, which came into force late on Friday.

This footage shows protesters, many wearing masks, marching on Sunday afternoon.

Mass protests in Hong Kong started in March over a now-shelved extradition bill that would have allowed people to be sent to mainland China for trial. The protests have broadened, with hundreds of thousands participating in multiple rallies. Credit: SocRec via Storyful

The protests have broadened, with hundreds of thousands participating in multiple rallies. Credit: SocRec via Storyful
